description: This Python script appears to be responsible for generating C++ header and source files for a JSON-RPC API based on a schema. It includes functions for creating headers, generating classes, enums, and stubs, as well as managing file timestamps and dependencies. The code utilizes various emitters and emitters for code generation, indicating its role in code scaffolding or code generation workflows within a larger project.
